name: Lava Rush
description:
Controls   1-9 : Mouse sensitivity   Mouse+WASD : Move   Space : Jump

Escape the rising lava by getting to higher ground as fast you can. Don't stop, and don't look down! Can you make it to the top?

This game is a submission for the 2kPlus jam and weighs in at under 2 kilobytes when zipped without audio. The plus version adds music, sound effects, the starting "Click to Play" screen, and compatibility for monitors or browsers that update animations faster than 60 Hz.

2 kilobyte version

Music: 029 - Unknown Orchestra
